name: Bigbot Smash City!
blurb: Adrenaline-packed game where you control a massive robot to smash human cities in 3D and fight off mankind. For iPhone/iPad/iPod Touch.

rewards.reward: NANOBOT: For each dollar you pledge, you get one vote to use in picking real-world cities (or towns) to be included as levels in the main campaign, and a heartfelt thank you via email.  Recognition in the in-game credits as a Nanobot Level contributor.

MICROBOT: A free copy of the game gifted to you (or whomever you designate) when it is released. (You will need a compatible iOS device to play it though.) Recognition in the in-game credits as a Microbot Level contributor. Plus the above.
BABYBOT: An exclusive high-res digital poster emailed to you for showing your support. Recognition in the in-game credits as a Babybot Level contributor.  Plus everything above.

MINIBOT:  Get the edgy adrenaline-packed Official Bigbot Smash City Soundtrack as MP3 downloads on game-launch day. Recognition in the in-game credits as a Minibot Level contributor.  Plus everything above.

BIGBOT:  A limited-edition handwritten heartfelt thank-you color-game-art postcard, personally autographed by developer. Recognition in the in-game credits as a Bigbot Level contributor.  Plus everything above.
JUMBOBOT:  Post a clean 140 character message in the in-game credits. Recognition in the in-game credits as a Jumbobot Level contributor.  Plus everything above.

GIANTBOT: You have a heart as big as a giant. Cover it with a Bigbot t-shirt in your choice of size. (Add an extra $10 for shipping outside USA) Recognition in the in-game credits as a Giantbot Level contributor.  Plus everything above.

GARGANTUBOT: Limited edition personally autographed Bigbot color poster (gargantuan sized, at 24" x 36"). (Add an extra $20 for shipping outside USA.) Recognition in the in-game credits as a Gargantubot Level contributor.  Plus everything above.

MASSIVEBOT: You get to pulverize the city of your choice! Pick 1 city of your own choice as a guaranteed level in the game, with up to 5 points of interest that you specify to be included as special locations. Get 5 additional free copies of the game gifted to your friends. Recognition in the in-game credits as a Massivebot Level contributor, and credit for that city being in the game.  Plus everything above.

TITANBOT: 1 custom overpowered component (weapon/armor/misc) based on your idea/sketch as an unlockable in-game upgrade. Recognition in the in-game credits as a Titanbot Level contributor, and credit for your idea.  Plus everything above.

ULTIMATE MEGABOT: 1 custom overpowered bigbot based on your idea/sketch as a fully functional in-game unlockable bot. An exclusively autographed and framed painting of your choice of bigbot, in a pose and background of your choosing, painted by artist Wanni.  You will have the developer's eternal thanks and appreciation. Recognition in the in-game credits as an Ultimate Megabot Level contributor, and credit for your ideas.  Plus everything above.
